verbs.description: While [ARG0: the rest of the world] [V: looks] [ARG1: to new and emerging technologies and markets] , Donald Trump is focused on a futile effort to revive industries that will soon be part of the past . His picking of economic winners and losers , especially through the use of tariffs , will be a losing bet for the American economy …
